attributes.action: Statue of Dave Whelan to be made and put up outside the DW Stadium
attributes.additional_details: Petition to make a statue of Dave Whelan and put it pride of place outside the DW Stadium in Wigan. All to show our respect and pride of one of the greatest sportsmen in history.

rejection.details: You don't need a petition to put up a statue.   Speak to the local Council once you have got the funding ready.
